906840.name: Fantasy Grounds - Quests of Doom 4: A Midnight Council of Quail (5E)
906840.description:
Quests of Doom 4: A Midnight Council of Quail

by
Lance Hawvermale
A Midnight Council of Quail is an adventure for 4-6 characters of 3rd to 5th level where the characters explore a village to locate the lair of a monstrous murderer -- but the villagers don't want the murderer to be discovered.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Team Twohy LLC
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
